email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to provide a quick update on the patients who could use some extra support this month:

• Mrs. Linda Smith – She is recovering from hip surgery and needs reliable transportation to and from her physical-therapy sessions (three times per week from Mercy General Hospital to her home in Oakwood).

• Mr. George Brown – He has been experiencing increased loneliness after a recent COPD exacerbation and would greatly benefit from regular companionship visits or weekly check-ins.

Please let me know if Helping Hands can assist with these needs or if you require any additional information about schedules, contact details, or care plans.

Thank you, as always, for the wonderful support your team provides to our patients.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Social Worker, Mercy General Hospital
